posts.post_content:
Hello: I have 25 different T206 cards I am looking to trade. This is a great group if you are looking to start the set. I am interested to trade for 1, 2 or 3 cards, preferably rookies or HOF from the 1950s or 60s. Please email me at [url]bucklercards@yahoo.com[/url] with any trade offers. 

Follow link below for scans of cards
[URL="http://imageevent.com/gimble200/t206"]http://imageevent.com/gimble200/t206[/URL]

Included
HOF Kelley
HOF Fred Clarke
HOF Bobby Wallace
Raymond
Mattern
Schaefer
Clancy
Seymour
Chappelle
Milan
Herzog
Dygert
Murphy Horizontal
Criss
Milligan
Hartsel
Hoffman
Gilbert
Ames
Wright
Stephens

Hofman

Thanks, 
Chris :)

On second look at the scans, I opted "Original" size, and that gave me a really good look.

Duh,

Doug
